metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3086 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Adobe Flash Player before 13.0.0.289 and 14.x through 17.x before17.0.0.188 on Windows and OS X and before 11.2.202.460 on Linux, Adobe AIRbefore 17.0.0.172, Adobe AIR SDK before 17.0.0.172, and Adobe AIR SDK &Compiler before 17.0.0.172 allow attackers to execute arbitrary code byleveraging an unspecified "type confusion," a different vulnerability thanCVE-2015-3077 and CVE-2015-3084.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-3086` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 11.2.202.460ubuntu0.14.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 11.2.202.460ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.2.202.460ubuntu0.14.04.1').
